      • listContents

        @OPTIONS
 @Path(value="{path:.*}")
 @Produces(value={"application/vnd.htrc-entry+xml","application/vnd.htrc-entry+json","application/xml","application/json"})
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response listContents(@Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                             javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @Context
                                                                                                                                                                                                             javax.ws.rs.core.UriInfo uriInfo,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @PathParam(value="path")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             String path,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="recursive")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             boolean recursive,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @DefaultValue(value=".*") @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             String nameFilterRegexp,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @DefaultValue(value=".*") @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             String typeFilterRegexp,
                                                                                                                                                                                                             @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="public")
                                                                                                                                                                                                             boolean listPublic)
        Description copied from interface: FilesAPI
        OPTIONS: Retrieve the metadata information of the entries found in the user's file space
        Specified by:
        listContents in interface FilesAPI
        Parameters:
        request - Injected HttpServletRequest
        uriInfo - Injected UriInfo
        path - The path in the user's file space to query for entries
        recursive - True to recurse subdirectories, False otherwise
        nameFilterRegexp - Only returns entries whose name matches this regular expression (default: .*)
        typeFilterRegexp - Only returns entries whose media type matches this regular expression (default: .*)
        listPublic - True to retrieve the public entries only (the shared files), False otherwise (default: false)
        Returns:
        The metadata for the entries found

 @Path(value="{path:.*}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response checkIfExists(@Context

                                                                               @PathParam(value="path")
                                                                               String path,
                                                                               @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="public")

        Description copied from interface: FilesAPI
        HEAD: Check whether a file/folder exists
        Specified by:
        checkIfExists in interface FilesAPI
        Parameters:
        request - Injected HttpServletRequest
        path - The path to check
        checkPublic - True to check for the path in the public file space, False otherwise
        Returns:
        200 if found, 404 if not

        @GET
 @Path(value="{path:.*}")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response getFileOrFolder(@Context
                                                                                javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                @PathParam(value="path")
                                                                                String path,
                                                                                @DefaultValue(value=".*") @QueryParam(value="name")
                                                                                String nameFilterRegexp,
                                                                                @DefaultValue(value=".*") @QueryParam(value="type")
                                                                                String typeFilterRegexp,
                                                                                @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="public")
                                                                                boolean getPublic)
        Description copied from interface: FilesAPI
        GET: Retrieve a file or folder
        Specified by:
        getFileOrFolder in interface FilesAPI
        Parameters:
        request - Injected HttpServletRequest
        path - The path to retrieve
        nameFilterRegexp - If retrieving a folder, include only entries whose name matches this regexp
        typeFilterRegexp - If retrieving a folder, include only entries whose media type matches this regexp
        getPublic - True to retrieve entries from the public file space, False otherwise
        Returns:
        The file or folder requested

        @POST
 @Path(value="{path:.*}")
 @Consumes(value="multipart/form-data")
public javax.ws.rs.core.Response uploadToFolder(@Context
                                                                                                                        javax.servlet.http.HttpServletRequest request,
                                                                                                                        @PathParam(value="path")
                                                                                                                        String path,
                                                                                                                        @DefaultValue(value="false") @QueryParam(value="public")
                                                                                                                        boolean isPublic,
                                                                                                                        @QueryParam(value="user")
                                                                                                                        String user,
                                                                                                                        List<org.apache.cxf.jaxrs.ext.multipart.Attachment> attachments)
        Description copied from interface: FilesAPI
        POST: Upload file(s) to folder
        Specified by:
        uploadToFolder in interface FilesAPI
        Parameters:
        request - Injected HttpServletRequest
        path - The path to the folder to upload to
        isPublic - True to upload to the public file space, False otherwise
        user - The user on behalf of whom to upload the files
        attachments - The list of files to upload
        Returns:
        204 if successful, error otherwise

        uploadFile in interface FilesAPI

        contentType - The file's media type
        path - The path to upload to
        isPublic - True to upload to the public file space, False otherwise
        user - The user on behalf of whom to upload the files
